recipesJson.name: Sugar Rush
recipesJson.author: ThirdWorldOrder
recipesJson.description:
I felt the "Cuttwood leak" base would be better suited for a Graham/cinnamon flavor profile. This one goes great with a cup of coffee in the morning!

Some people like this one with a bit more CDS, let your tastebuds guide you.

Misc Notes:
This is not a Sugar Bear clone and probably doesn't taste anything like it. I apologize for picking a similar name.

reviews.text: unfortunately I find Cap Cinnamon Danish Swirl way to dry for me, it ruins any cinnamon vape I try. I can only vape FLV Rich Cinnamon, anything else sucks. It sounded so nice, but it's just way to dry and potent for me.

One of the first recipes I mixed around 2 years ago. This recipe drove me deeper down the diy rabbit hole. As soon as I tasted this I swore of commercial juice. Still to this day one of my favorite recipes of all time. Glad to see you on ATF, had no idea you were on here and not just Elr lol. You are truly a master
